code:
%%{init: {'theme': 'neutral'}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> ACCUMULATE

    ACCUMULATE --> ACCUMULATE: beat < RATIO-1
    ACCUMULATE --> OUTPUT: beat == RATIO-1 or LAST

    OUTPUT --> ACCUMULATE: m_ready

    note right of ACCUMULATE
        Collecting narrow beats
        into buffer
    end note

    note right of OUTPUT
        Buffer full
        Output wide beat
    end note
repo_description: This site is hopefully a springboard for others to learn about coding in System Verilog and experimenting with FPGAs.
